name: Me (RioStudio)
description:
Me is an installation project that records different stages in understanding my queer identity. I chose to organize it in a temple-like form, and the main structure is life-size with layers of images and fabrics, forming the walls of the installation. The installation converges into a source image, guiding me to build up space around my struggles in accepting myself in my college time. The key considerations are 1) layers of lace fabrics and papers; 2) the distance between audiences and those layers.

_____________________________________________________________________

Control: use WASD to move, ESC to quit
